input.description: XML document conforming to the ConnectionDetails Concept that contains the information required to execute a command via command line
Do not create a file if none exists. Valid value: true
Defines the timestamps to be modified. Valid values: MODIFICATION AND ACCESS

output.description: XML document consisting of one or more <line> elements that contain the command response. Each <line> element contains an index attribute indicating the order in which the information was returned by the command.
Did the operation succeed? Valid values: true

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <fat-command> <command os-id="Linux"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">touch </xsl:text> <xsl:if test="string-length('${no create}') != 0 and '${no create}' = 'true'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">-c </xsl:text> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${timestamp to change}') != 0 and '${timestamp to change}' = 'MODIFICATION'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">-m </xsl:text> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${timestamp to change}') != 0 and '${timestamp to change}' = 'ACCESS'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">-a </xsl:text> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${file}') != 0"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${file}</xsl:text> </xsl:if> </command> <command os-id="SunOS"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">touch </xsl:text> <xsl:if test="string-length('${no create}') != 0 and '${no create}' = 'true'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">-c </xsl:text> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${timestamp to change}') != 0 and '${timestamp to change}' = 'MODIFICATION'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">-m </xsl:text> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${timestamp to change}') != 0 and '${timestamp to change}' = 'ACCESS'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">-a </xsl:text> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${file}') != 0"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${file}</xsl:text> </xsl:if> </command> <command os-id="Windows Default"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">echo Command not supported on Windows Operating System.</xsl:text> </command> </fat-command> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: Update File Timestamp Alter the timestamp of the given file or create a new file if the file does not exist.
